changes.description: Blueprint was refactored to add back `helper_last_controller_event` in order to fix Long Press/Release Logic for both hooks and custom actions. This will close ([EPMatt-issue#949](https://github.com/EPMatt/awesome-ha-blueprints/issues/949)). See note at top regarding **Helper - Last Controller Event** input.
